name: Battle Power Ultra
description:
Battle Power is a real-time platform shooting game, where each player must defeat their opponent using a wide variety of projectile weapons. But be careful! Each move  and decision must be taken rapidly and carefully, as you have to attack your enemy at the same time you avoid their shots!

This version includes 1 and 2 players modes, 8 different weapons and customizable battlefield settings.

This version was played by more than 5000 people back in 2009, when it was released in YoyoGames website.

You can also check the latest version of this game: https://champol.itch.io/battle-power-mega
